body: Yep the `u` is correct. Just checked and it looks like the promotion is to `int` when the type of the value is smaller than `int`: https://wiki.sei.cmu.edu/confluence/display/c/EXP14-C.+Beware+of+integer+promotion+when+performing+bitwise+operations+on+integer+types+smaller+than+int
